lead_paragraph: A. J. Allmendinger, a Champ Car driver, became the latest open-wheel defector yesterday when he signed a deal to drive for Team Red Bull in Nascar. Allmendinger, 24, completes a lineup that already includes the 23-year-old Brian Vickers, who announced in June he was joining the team.
